title: I did get a S but I didnt get a token for it?
body: Why didnt I get a token for it? I played solo ranked summoners rift. My champ was level 3 but that should still give me a token if i get a S, shouldnt it?

replies.body:
You can only start earning Mastery Tokens on a champion once you've hit Mastery Level 5 on them. You'll actually receive a neat little message when you are eligible to earn tokens on that champ, just keep in mind that you can't earn that token **AND** hit level 5 in the same match. :P

Be sure to check our [**Champion Mastery Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204211284-Champion-Mastery-Guide) out for more information on how the system works. If you have any other questions, please don't hesitate to ask!

Have you guys ever considered increasing the required tokens by one and just giving everyone a token when they hit rank 5 to introduce them to the system that they now need to use to advance and avoid the constant confusion that not getting then on wins that hit rank 5 produces?

You only become eligible to earn tokens for a champion once you reach mastery level 5 with that champion. You are unable to get them until then. 

Also note that if you get an S- or better in the same game you reach mastery level 5 with a champion, you will not get a token, as you were still considered level 4, not 5.
